title: Toy’s brands typefaces
content:
Hi everyone...

Im looking for typefaces used in the logo of LEGO and MATCHBOX.

Both might possible be handdrawn, but because a lot of digitalisation  
has been going on the last years (like Tintin comic-balloons typeface...)  
maybe something similar has been done for these two brands.

But maybe both are based on exixsting typefaces...

anyone a idea?

many thanks,

matthijs

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629063213im_/http:/typophile.com/files/legofont.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629063213im_/http:/typophile.com/files/matchboxfont.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Hudson's Bay flyer/Old Navy signage font - Chalet London 1960 {Miguel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629063213/http:/typophile.com/node/19284 "Go to previous forum topic") [A close match for unavailable typeface - Quadra by Rudolph de Harak ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629063213/http:/typophile.com/node/19280 "Go to next forum topic")
author: matthijs van Leeuwen
